title: Enable AI to generate playable video games from user prompts

requirements.summary: Update GameRenderer to handle dynamically generated games beyond the six hardcoded types
acceptanceCriteria: GameRenderer successfully renders any self-contained HTML/JS/CSS payload returned by the backend, not just the six hardcoded game types.
The sandboxed iframe correctly loads and runs the injected HTML game code.
Expand/collapse functionality continues to work for all rendered games.
If the gamePayload is malformed or empty, the renderer handles the error gracefully without crashing.

file_operations.description: Remove the hardcoded game type detection logic and JSON parsing that currently maps to six predefined game templates (Snake, Pong, Memory, Breakout, Flappy Bird, Tetris). Replace with a generic renderer that treats the gamePayload as a complete, self-contained HTML string with inline JS and CSS. Render this HTML directly into the sandboxed iframe using srcdoc. Preserve the expand/collapse functionality and sandboxing attributes (sandbox='allow-scripts'). Add error handling to gracefully catch and display malformed or empty payloads without crashing the component.

requirements.summary: Update empty-state prompt suggestions to reflect expanded game-building capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: The empty-state UI shows at least 4 varied game-building prompt suggestions covering different genres.
Clicking any suggestion pre-fills the chat input with that prompt.
Suggestions reflect genres beyond the six hardcoded games.

file_operations.description: Update the empty-state prompt suggestion arrays to include a wider variety of game-building examples that reflect the AI's expanded capability to generate any genre. Replace or supplement existing game prompts with diverse examples such as 'Make me a platformer game', 'Create a space shooter', 'Build a tower defense game', 'Make a puzzle game', 'Create a racing game', and 'Build an RPG adventure'. Ensure at least 4 varied game genre suggestions are visible in the game-building prompt section. Preserve the existing click-to-fill behavior and the general gaming info prompts section.
